General.Name: Snowsky Salt Industry Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Snowsky Salt Industry Group Co., Ltd. engages in production and sale of salt and salt products. It offers table salt, industrial salt, daily chemical salt, livestock salt, caustic soda, soda ash, ammonium chloride, hydrogen peroxide, glauber salt, etc. The company was formerly known as Hunan Salt Industry Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Changsha, China. Snowsky Salt Industry Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hunan Province Light Industry & Salt Industry Group Co.,Ltd.
General.Address: Qingyan Sunshine City, No. 388, Changsha, China, 410004
